name: Courses
description:
Courses is an example of a minimalist site, the purpose of which is to convey to the user the main idea of the project. Due to the structure of the site, the user first of all pays attention to the most important elements, namely the link to the beginning of the course and information about the organizers of the project.


The site is not visually overloaded: it will be more convenient for the user and faster for the browser.


Well, the color scheme is light and unobtrusive, and a dark version is also available!
